Text.Page:
I hope you're doing well, .

I heard about Highwatch. I have to say, I'm very impressed.

I've been positioned at the Khanovar Front. Every day is like fighting a giant wall. My troops are getting tired.

Like you did in Northern Arun, would you show the argons what you're capable of?

We need a hero, .
I'll leave encrypted coordinates in this letter. If needed, the teleportal master can help you out. I'll see you soon.

â€”Tamur"I'll be right there, Tamur."
